function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of information sharing and collaboration between technical managers in healthcare facilities","Impact":"Inefficient management of building domains and services, leading to increased risk of contagious disease propagation","Mitigation":"Establish regular and structured communication channels between technical managers, implement standardized reporting systems","Technologies":"Collaboration platforms, communication tools, standardized reporting software","People":"Technical managers in healthcare facilities","Owner":"Healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation systems in healthcare facilities","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases, potential spread of pathogens within the building environment","Mitigation":"Upgrade ventilation and air circulation systems, conduct regular maintenance and inspections, implement air purification technologies","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air quality monitoring devices, air purification systems","People":"Building maintenance staff, HVAC technicians","Owner":"Building management, facilities management"},{"Description":"Incomplete or inaccurate building maps and characteristics","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and addressing potential areas of contamination, hindering effective disease control measures","Mitigation":"Conduct accurate and detailed mapping of building layouts, update regularly with new construction or modifications","Technologies":"Building information modeling (BIM) software, digital mapping tools, 3D scanning technology","People":"Facility planners, building maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management, facilities management"}]}
